message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! That product looks great, but I was hoping to spend a bit less. Would you be willing to go down to $85?
I can do a bit better than that, Bob. I'm willing to sell it to you for $92.50.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we split the difference and call it $90 even?
I can see you're a shrewd negotiator, Bob! I can meet you halfway between $90 and $92.50, so I'll sell it to you for $91.25.
